issue.title: Re-establish compatibility between simulated and real Atlas

content.raw:
We are working on getting the updated behavior libraries for simulation from BDI/Google, it's in process... we'll post updates here as soon as they become available.

Once we get something in the pipeline, following issues will be tackled:

 * issue #371 - recover walk behavior for Atlas v3.
 * issue #365 - update `AtlasState.msg` to use new joint names for Atlas v3.
 * issue #343 - check if replacement for `k_effort` has been implemented.
 * issue #361 - update torque limits pending permissions from BDI/Google.

Thanks.
content.html:
We are working on getting the updated behavior libraries for simulation from BDI/Google, it's in process... we'll post updates here as soon as they become available.

Once we get something in the pipeline, following issues will be tackled:

  • issue #371 - recover walk behavior for Atlas v3.
  • issue #365 - update AtlasState.msg to use new joint names for Atlas v3.
  • issue #343 - check if replacement for k_effort has been implemented.
  • issue #361 - update torque limits pending permissions from BDI/Google.

Thanks.
